update bm_mat set company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, company_name = #{companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, version = #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER}, mat_no = #{matNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mat_cascade_type = #{matNameId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mat_name_id = #{matNameId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mat_name = #{matName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mat_type_id = #{matTypeId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, mat_type_name = #{matTypeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rawnature_id = #{rawnatureId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, rawnature_name = #{rawnatureName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mat_desc = #{matDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, min_stock_qty = #{minStockQty,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, batch_qty = #{batchQty,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, procure_style = #{procureStyle,jdbcType=CHAR}, is_qc = #{isQc,jdbcType=CHAR}, unit_no = #{unitNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, weight = #{weight,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, shape = #{shape,jdbcType=CHAR}, spec = #{shape,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, length = #{length,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, width = #{width,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, height = #{height,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, processes_type = #{processesType,jdbcType=CHAR}, plan_price = #{planPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, pic_path = #{picPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bin_no = #{binNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_unused = #{isUnused,jdbcType=CHAR}, handler_id = #{handlerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, handled_time = #{handledTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where mat_id = #{matId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
SELECT mat_name as mat_desc,mat_id,mat_no,mat_type_id,mat_type_name,plan_price as price,unit_no as unit,weight FROM bm_mat WHERE
mat_type_id not in (select id from bm_mt_mat_type where mat_type in ('MFG','MSEM','MELC')) and
mat_name REGEXP #{mat_desc} and
company_id = #{company_id}
select DISTINCT mat_name from bm_mat where mat_type_name='标准件' AND company_id = #{company_id}
select COUNT(*) from bm_mat where company_id = #{company_id}
